item.title: Vegans, why calling people murderers and rapists isn't the best way to get them to listen to your arguments.
item.description: Reason cannot be cultivated in a mind consumed by emotions. Yes, I agree with the ethics and moral standing of the vegan argument. It is not right to take the lives of sentient beings that have the same desire as us to enjoy life and procreate. Yes, I and many other meat eaters agree that factory farming is abhorent at the very least and alternatives methods of cultivating animal based protiens, if people insist upon or require them for health reasons, need to be devised and implimented.
